info.name: Feedly Un-Pro
info.description: Remove annoyances requesting you to upgrade to Pro version
info.additionalInfo:
* Update: Remove 'Upgrade' button, remove new search disabler overlay

Removes:
* Pro Ad Module
* "Shared Collections" menu item
* "Upgrade" button
* Pro feature tips section
* Search function disabler/overlay. Note that you are still limited to three results.
* Hootsuite addon suggestion
* Remove "Integrations" menu item
* Remove "Pro Support" item
